Container.Name: cv-manager-public
Container.Overview:
CV Manager - Public Read-Only Interface
Share your professional CV safely with this read-only version. Perfect for:
• Public exposure via Cloudflare Tunnel • Sharing with recruiters/employers • Portfolio website integration • Job application submissions
PUBLIC VERSION - Read-only access. All write operations blocked. Safe to expose publicly.
IMPORTANT: Install "CV Manager" (admin) first, then use the SAME appdata path here to share the data.
The app auto-detects read-only mode from the volume mount.
Default ports: Admin (3000) + Public (3001)
Container.Requires: CV Manager (admin version) should be installed first

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Host port for the public interface. Change this to use a different port (e.g. 8080). Do NOT change the PUBLIC_PORT variable below.

Config.Name: AppData
Config.Description: Database and uploads storage (read-only). IMPORTANT: Use the SAME path as your CV Manager Admin container!

Config.Name: Public Port (internal)
Config.Description: Internal container port. DO NOT CHANGE this value. To use a different port, change the WebUI Port above instead.
